QuestData.Title: Windows to the Soul
QuestData.Description:
Were it not enough for our enemy to apply deadly force against us, their minions also strike into the very heart of our defenders.
I speak, of course, of the eyes. They peer into the souls of our warriors and produce their darkest fears against them.
If we have any hope to defeat this foe, they must be destroyed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Eyes of the Empire in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
